articles.title: Narendra Modi and Xi Jinping meet: Donald Trump as the wildcard and other takeaways for India-China relationship - BBC
articles.description: The meeting took place just days after Trump's administration slapped high tariffs on India.
articles.content:
Vikas PandeyIndia editor and
Stephen McdonellChina correspondent
Modi and Xi posed for pictures in Tianjin on Monday
Just a few months ago, the armed forces of India and Pakistan were locked in a … [+7533 chars]
